member.name: M:StgSharp.Graphic.LoadGL
member.summary: Load OpenGL API to StgSharp core programm, please call this method before call any other graphic APIs in StgSharp.
member.exception: If run this method twice, will throw exception

member.name: M:StgSharp.Graphic.InitGL
member.summary: Init an instance of OpenGL program, This method should be called before other graphic methods, after LoadGL method.

member.name: M:StgSharp.Graphic.InitGLAD
member.summary: Attach GLFW API to GLAD, this method should be called after LoadGL and before other graphic method.
member.exception: The accident that program cannot attach GLFW to GLAD
